subject: Everton Blog prediction: Everton to score, but Charlton to win by one goal margin.
body:
I read that the first thing the brothers will do is 
tell sir Ferguson that he will be cut if he doesn't win the EPL Championship for 
Manchester this series. McFadden - any which way? If you send me anything via the 
e-mail link, you agree that it may be posted as feedback . If you look to the right 
hand side [or for some browsers, to the foot] of this article, you'll see a tower 
banner containing the latest BBC news headlines that relate to Everton.
Parker for Tottenham ?
